SELECT /* etpinfo.getIndexInfoByCodeDtl 시장을 대표하는 코드와 지수정보를 조회한다. */ td_index_basic.F16013 AS F16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.F16002 AS F16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , td_index_basic.market_id AS market_id /* 시장 ID */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */
, td_index_basic.F15001 AS F15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_index_basic.F15472 AS F15472 /* 대비 */ , td_index_basic.F15004 AS F15004 /* 등락율 */
, tm_code_dtl.com_val01 AS com_val01 /* 단축코드 */ , tm_code_dtl.com_val02 AS com_val02 /* 지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP) */ , tm_code_dtl.com_val03 AS com_val03 /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */
FROM td_index_basic INNER JOIN ( SELECT tm_code_dtl.com_val01 AS com_val01 , tm_code_dtl.com_val02 AS com_val02 , tm_code_dtl.com_val03 AS com_val03
FROM tm_code_dtl
WHERE tm_code_dtl.com_mst_cd = #{com_mst_cd} AND tm_code_dtl.use_yn = '1' ) tm_code_dtl ON ( td_index_basic.F16013 = tm_code_dtl.com_val01 AND td_index_basic.large_type = tm_code_dtl.com_val02 AND td_index_basic.middle_type = tm_code_dtl.com_val03 ) WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT td_etp_basic.* , DATE_FORMAT( td_etp_basic.F12506, '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS F12506 /* 입회일 */
FROM td_etp_basic , ( SELECT td_index_basic.F16013 AS F16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ FROM td_index_basic WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_index_basic.F16013 = #{com_val01} /* 단축코드 */ AND td_index_basic.large_type = #{com_val02} /* 지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP) */ AND td_index_basic.middle_type = #{com_val03} /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ ) base
WHERE 1 = 1 AND td_etp_basic.F16257 = base.F16013 /* ETP기초지수코드 */ AND base.middle_type = CASE WHEN td_etp_basic.F34239 = '2' /* ETP기초지수MID */ THEN 'KSP'
WHEN td_etp_basic.F34239 = '4' /* ETP기초지수MID */ THEN 'KSQ' END ORDER BY td_etp_basic.F16257 , base.middle_type
